_package_info.description: Street-smart abilities for dystopian cyberpunk futures including hacking, corporate infiltration, augmentation tech, and urban survival
_package_info.author: Storymaster

skills.name: Netrunning
skills.description: Hacking into computer systems and navigating cyberspace using neural interface implants

skills.name: Corporate Infiltration
skills.description: Blending into corporate environments through social engineering and identity manipulation

skills.name: Cybernetic Maintenance
skills.description: Installing, repairing, and upgrading cybernetic implants and body modifications

skills.name: Street Knowledge
skills.description: Understanding urban underground networks, gang territories, and black market operations

skills.name: Data Mining
skills.description: Extracting valuable information from digital networks and encrypted databases

skills.name: Neural Hacking
skills.description: Directly interfacing with human minds to extract or implant memories and thoughts

skills.name: Corporate Espionage
skills.description: Gathering intelligence on megacorporation activities through covert surveillance

skills.name: Augmented Combat
skills.description: Fighting using cybernetic enhancements, smart weapons, and tactical implants

skills.name: Virtual Reality Navigation
skills.description: Moving through and manipulating digital environments and virtual worlds

skills.name: Electronic Warfare
skills.description: Disrupting enemy systems through jamming, viruses, and electromagnetic attacks

skills.name: Bio-modification
skills.description: Altering human biology through genetic engineering and biological augmentation

skills.name: Urban Parkour
skills.description: Moving through dense city environments using enhanced agility and wall-running

skills.name: Drone Control
skills.description: Operating multiple robotic units simultaneously for surveillance and combat

skills.name: Memory Extraction
skills.description: Recovering deleted or hidden information from human and artificial minds

skills.name: Street Fighting
skills.description: Brutal unarmed combat adapted for urban environments and gang warfare

skills.name: Holographic Disguise
skills.description: Using hard-light projections and digital camouflage to alter appearance

skills.name: Corporate Psychology
skills.description: Understanding and manipulating corporate hierarchy and executive mindsets

skills.name: Illegal Augmentation
skills.description: Installing black market cybernetics and experimental body modifications

skills.name: Data Encryption
skills.description: Protecting information using advanced cryptographic techniques and quantum security

skills.name: Synthetic Drug Creation
skills.description: Manufacturing psychoactive substances and performance-enhancing chemicals

skills.name: AI Communication
skills.description: Interfacing with artificial intelligences and understanding machine consciousness

skills.name: Vehicle Hacking
skills.description: Taking control of automated vehicles and transportation systems

skills.name: Surveillance Detection
skills.description: Identifying and avoiding corporate monitoring systems and tracking devices

skills.name: Wetware Programming
skills.description: Coding software directly into biological neural networks and brain tissue

skills.name: Black Market Trading
skills.description: Negotiating deals for illegal goods, information, and contraband technology

skills.name: Digital Forensics
skills.description: Analyzing electronic evidence and tracing digital footprints through networks

skills.name: Corpo-speak
skills.description: Fluency in corporate jargon, business protocols, and executive communication

skills.name: Stimulant Resistance
skills.description: Building tolerance to drugs, toxins, and chemical enhancement compounds

skills.name: Information Brokering
skills.description: Buying, selling, and trading valuable data and intelligence on the grey market

skills.name: Cybernetic Integration
skills.description: Maximizing compatibility between organic tissue and artificial implants

skills.name: Quantum Encryption
skills.description: Using quantum mechanics principles to create unbreakable communication codes

skills.name: Gang Diplomacy
skills.description: Negotiating with street gangs, criminal organizations, and underground factions

skills.name: Biometric Spoofing
skills.description: Faking fingerprints, retinal scans, and other biological security measures

skills.name: Corporate Sabotage
skills.description: Disrupting megacorporation operations through targeted attacks and system failures

skills.name: Neural Interface
skills.description: Direct brain-computer connection for enhanced reaction time and data access

skills.name: Urban Survival
skills.description: Thriving in overcrowded, polluted, and dangerous metropolitan environments
